}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device is an [[ORiNOCO PC Card]] in an adapter which allows it to be used over a USB bus. The adapter uses a Cypress EZ-USB chip.
This device is not to be confused with the [[ORiNOCO LC USB Client]], which has essentially the same appearance.. but instead of an [[ORiNOCO PC Card]], the device integrates all components onto a single board (and also uses a newer '''Ruby''' radio, which requires newer firmware).
This device was also sold as the '''Zoom''' 4115. The HP P1980A is a Silver USB Client (with the same USB ID as the standard ORiNOCO client - 047e:0300).
[[Category:English Documentation]]
